original_title: Former Sri Lanka Rugby player arrested
original_body_lines: Former Sri Lanka Rugby player Mahendran Sendil Kumar Premanath has been arrested on charges of theft and the possession of heroin.
The 36-year-old Premanath was caught on CCTV stealing a man's gold necklace.

He was earlier handed a six-month jail sentence and Rs. 7500 fine in 2012 by Mt.Lavinia magistrate Ruchira Weliwatte after being found guilty on three counts of snatching gold chains from women walking on roads

Kumar was a star utility player playing from positions of Hooker to Centre and was also a placekicker turning out for CR & FC, CH & FC and Havelocks and was a regular member of the Sri Lanka team since 2007.
